description: washed out image of the head of a man turned slightly to the right with lips slightly pursed; zig-zagging horizontal lines cover right side of face; same image printed on verso of sheet although it appears fainter and more washed out; right side of the sheet of paper is torn and jagged
inscription: LR in pencil, under image: 28 | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: W. Gramatté E 154 (einziger Druck) | LR in pencil, below image: 28 | LRC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 1901
title: Self-Portrait
